content: give your party bunting a humorous homely feel with set of clothes that captures the everyday joy of freshly dried laundry make this colorful garland and decorate your kid s room laundry room garden or any place at home easy to follow crochet pattern to make this beautiful decorative bunting featuring skirt t-shirt dress and trousers the patterns use single_crochet stitch throughout us terms pattern is written in us terms in english only finished size of each garment dress 18cm/7 long t-shirt 12cm/4 25 long trousers 11cm/4 25 long skirt 12cm/4 75 long
